text: Mr. Belvedere Rings the Bell is a 1951 American comedy movie directed by Henry Koster and is the third and final movie of the series of Lynn Belvedere movies. It stars Joanne Dru, Clifton Webb, Hugh Marlowe, Zero Mostel, Doro Merande and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1951 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Henry Koster
title: Mr. Belvedere Rings the Bell
